“Stabbed I thought you said scratched.” Sheila said kneeling down to assess the damage for herself. Satisfied by the size she applied a handkerchief to your flesh wound. Shining the flashlight you caught the visage of a stone woman carved following an exaggerated female form. Including a ripe melon like belly. From one of her fingernails dripped a drop of incriminating blood. “That is what you get for cheating on me with a goddess.”

“You know I like mine more lively.” You said pulling Sheila in for a passionate kiss. Your hand throbbed but you ignored it. A deep desire to take your spouse seized hold.

Sheila breaking off the kiss, “We need to get back to the others to gather up before night closes in on us.” Reluctantly you nodding starting the journey back. Failing to notice the cloth falling free from your hand. Along with the throbbing your hand shrunk without you noticing. Cracks and calluses built over time smoothed out on your wounded hand.
141.title: Derek

info.brief_description: You and your family survive a shipwreck and wash up on a strange island.
info.description:
It was supposed to be a relaxing family vacation, probably your last before you move out on your own. But when your tour boat sinks in a violent storm, you are washed up on the shores of a unknown island that was clearly once inhabited. You soon find that there many supernatural forces at work in the ruins of this lost civilization that can transform a person in ways they can't imagine.

Here be the rules:

You can introduce new characters, but no children - let's keep everyone over the age of 16.

No scat, waterworks, slob fetishes, children, or humans with animal scenes. (Anthro/furry is fine, just no humans engaging in bestiality)

Apart from that just about anything goes within reason.



Initial characters:

You: Alex Grant, 23 years old. Fairly average, slightly athletic, 6' tall, brown eyes, tanned skin, dark wavy hair.

Shelia Grant: Your mother, 45 years old, long, wavy black hair, brown eyes, yoga fanatic, very fit, 36D breasts, firm and curvy body. She is 5'6" tall.

Derek Kline: Your step father, 44 years old, 6'1", former athlete, still in good shape with just a little extra weight on top. Short brown hair, green eyes.

Lacy Grant: Your younger sister, 17 years old, green eyes, light brown hair, 5'5" tall, very thin. Slender body with 34 B cup breasts.

Kendra Grant: Your older sister, 27 years old, 5'4" tall, chubby, shorter black hair, green eyes, heavier, hourglass shaped body, her lip has a small ring peircing in it and both nipples have small barbell peircings as well.

Jack Newman: Kendra's boyfriend. 29 years old, muscular but but also a little overweight, tattoos cover most of his arms and chest, peirced and stretched ears.

Lance Logan: The captain of the ship, 30 years old, 6'3" tall, dark skin, very athletic, short curly hair, brown eyes.
